entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , L'Islet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
